name: FBCleaned
description: Something to make the new Facebook more manageable. I'm not great at this so it may be messy but it works.
additional_info:
Update Dec 1st:
Various fixes including miscoloured icons on the top bar.

Update Dec 18th:
Major Update! Complete UI redesign.

Update Dec 22nd:
Fixes a transparency issue on some things that occurred due to an error on my part.

Update Mar 30th 2021:
Various Fixes.

Update Dec 13th 2021:
General Fixes.

discussions.name: Love it but one thing i cant find to change ! :S
